Lyric:
[00:13.350]Imagine theres no heaven
[00:19.680]Its easy if you try
[00:25.930]No hell below us
[00:32.310]Above us only sky
[00:37.950]Imagine all the people
[00:43.940]Living for today...
[00:52.360]Imagine theres no countries
[00:58.060]It isnt hard to do
[01:04.070]Nothing to kill or die for
[01:10.360]And no religion too
[01:16.840]Imagine all the people
[01:22.200]Living life in peace...
[01:30.060]You may say Im a dreamer
[01:35.520]But Im not the only one
[01:41.890]I hope someday youll join us
[01:48.250]And the world will be as one.
[01:54.710]Imagine no possessions
[02:00.640]I wonder if you can
[02:06.980]No need for greed or hunger
[02:13.430]A brotherhood of man
[02:19.780]Imagine all the people
[02:25.240]Sharing all the world...
[02:32.610]You may say Im a dreamer
[02:38.850]But Im not the only one
[02:45.050]I hope someday youll join us
[02:51.430]And the world will be as one.
